name: AwesomeAlRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Awesome Al Radio”
”Alexa, open Awesome Al Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: awesome a. l. radio
des: Welcome to your information and entertainment station. We play a variety of classic and contemporary smooth R&B, soft rock, golden country, inspiring gospel, soothing jazz/neo-soul, and southern soul. You will be informed of current weather forecasts and public service announcements. Awesome Al radio is infotainment at its best. Tune in and enjoy the “Awesome” Ride.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
